duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the development of hybrid eVTOL aircraft electrical system, and ensure its safety and reliability.
Select electrical components, design circuits, and manage system suppliers to connect actuators, flight controllers, and sensors according to specifications.
Assist with electrical system installation, following industry standards, and ensuring proper aviation standards are met.
Ensure the aircraft is electrically ready for flight by verifying installation details and design.
Focus primarily on installation design with occasional installation work as needed.
Interface with suppliers for the manufacture of harnesses and verify their quality.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering or Electronics Engineering
